cards.name: Puffskein
cards.description: Puffskeins are round and fluffy beasts, soft enough to cuddle but tough enough to be thrown around. Puffskeins will eat almost anything, but their favorite meal is bogies. They are common household pets for wizarding families because they are easy to maintain.
cards.prerequisite: Must complete main story quest "The Elf, the Nab-sack, and the Loom"

cards.name: Fwooper
cards.description: A Fwooper is a colourful bird thst has a song known to drive peaople mad.
cards.prerequisite: Must complete main story quest "The Elf, the Nab-sack, and the Loom"

cards.name: Jobberknoll
cards.description: A Jobberknoll is a small speckled bluebird, which never makes any noise until the moment of its death.
cards.prerequisite: Must complete main story quest "The Elf, the Nab-sack, and the Loom"

cards.name: Graphorn
cards.description: Graphorns are large mountain-dwelling beasts that have a tough hide and two sharp horns. The tentacle-like appendages on Graphornsâ€™ faces are used for capturing food and tending to their young. Graphorns are known for their aggressive nature; however, a witch of wizard has been known to befriend one in rare circumstances.
cards.prerequisite: Must complete main story quest "San Bakar's Trial"

cards.name: Mooncalf
cards.description: The Mooncalf is a small, calf-like beast with enormous eyes and a shy personality. They can be observed dancing when the light of the full moon hits the ground.
cards.prerequisite: Must complete main story quest "The Elf, the Nab-sack, and the Loom"

cards.name: Unicorn
cards.description: The Unicorn is a shy and beautiful equine beast that sports a horn from its head. The foals are said to have shimmering golden coats.
cards.prerequisite: Must complete main story quest "The Elf, the Nab-sack, and the Loom"

cards.name: Niffler
cards.description: The Niffler is a small, furry and mischievous beast that causes mayhem in its pursuit of shiny objects which it stores in its marsupial-like pouch.
cards.prerequisite: Must complete main story quest "The Elf, the Nab-sack, and the Loom"

cards.name: Giant Purple Toad
cards.description: A large magical toad with warts that are useful in potion-making.
cards.prerequisite: Must complete main story quest "The Elf, the Nab-sack, and the Loom"

cards.name: Thestral
cards.description: The Thestral is a haunted, winged equine beast that is only visible to those who have seen death.
cards.prerequisite: Must complete main story quest "The Elf, the Nab-sack, and the Loom"

cards.name: Hippogriff
cards.description: The Hippogriff is a majestic beast with the front half of an eagle and the back half of a horse. The Hippogriff can soar great distances and commands the respect of anyone who dares to approach it.
cards.prerequisite: Must complete main story quest "The High Keep"

cards.name: Kneazle
cards.description: Kneazles are cat-like beasts that have large ears and a plumed tail. They can be aggressive, but if they like a witch or wizard, they make exceptional pets. Kneazles are highly intelligent and have an ability to detect suspicious or distrustful people.
cards.prerequisite: Must complete main story quest "The Elf, the Nab-sack, and the Loom"

cards.name: Diricawl
cards.description: Diricawls are plump, fluffy birds incapable of flight. They have the unique ability to vanish and reappear to escape danger. Muggles were aware of these birds at one time and called them Dodos. However, Muggles now believe them to be extinct.
cards.prerequisite: Must complete main story quest "The Elf, the Nab-sack, and the Loom"

cards.name: Phoenix
cards.description: The phoenix is an elegant, rare bird that possesses powerful magic. It is reborn from its ashes after bursting into flames. The loyalty of the phoenix is hard won.
cards.prerequisite: Must complete the side quest "Phoenix Rising"
